mutants.code:
def is_fibonacci(n):
    x = 1
    y = 1
    while y < n:
        z = x + y
        x = y
        y = z
    return y == n or n == 0

def is_fibonacci(n):
    x = -1
    y = 1
    while y < n:
        z = x + y
        x = y
        y = z
    return y == n or n == 0
